Name: Hard Block Girls
About the game: Getting into a woman's mind can be the hardest puzzle of a life time, but surely your tile-matching skills will make things easier with this gang! Crack the puzzles and help them overcome fears and insecurities. Destroy all the anxiety blocks and free these women from all negative beliefs! In Hard Block Girls you can help four women to prevail over past traumas, rejection, loneliness and exausting pursuit for perfectionism. Win four levels to achieve a happy ending for you and each character, destroying all the anxiety blocks created from their fast-growing fears and failure-experiences. After each success both of you can be more intimate and the puzzles will get harder, but the reward will definetly be worth your effort. Don't stop until you save Olivia, Vienna, Lizzie and Amber from themselves!
